Pre-Game Insights: Experts predict that the pitch will be good for bowlers, making in-form all-rounders or bowlers the best captain or vice-captain choices.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played on June 12 at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York, with the game set to take place at 8:00 PM IST.
Others: India and the United States of America are tied at the top of Group A with two wins each.
